name: emp-ai-backend
description: EmProps AI Backend - Distributed AI workload orchestration with specialized machine pools

scripts.dev:redis:stop: pkill redis-server || echo '✅ Redis already stopped'
scripts.d:api:build: pnpm check:core && cd apps/api && node prepare-docker-build.js && docker build --platform linux/amd64 --build-arg BUILD_DATE=$(date -u +%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ) -t emprops/api:latest .
scripts.d:api:build:nocache: pnpm check:core && cd apps/api && node prepare-docker-build.js && docker build --no-cache --platform linux/amd64 --build-arg BUILD_DATE=$(date -u +%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ) -t emprops/api:latest .
scripts.d:api:status: curl -s http://localhost:3331/health | jq || echo '❌ API health check failed'
scripts.d:webhook:build: pnpm check:core && cd apps/webhook-service && node prepare-docker-build.js && docker build --platform linux/amd64 --build-arg BUILD_DATE=$(date -u +%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ) -t emprops/webhook-service:latest .
scripts.d:webhook:build:nocache: pnpm check:core && cd apps/webhook-service && node prepare-docker-build.js && docker build --no-cache --platform linux/amd64 --build-arg BUILD_DATE=$(date -u +%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ) -t emprops/webhook-service:latest .
scripts.d:webhook:run: cd apps/webhook-service && docker run --rm --name webhook-service -p 3332:3332 --env-file .env.local-dev --env-file .env.secret.local-dev emprops/webhook-service:latest
scripts.d:webhook:status: curl -s http://localhost:3332/health | jq || echo '❌ Webhook health check failed'
scripts.d:fluentd:build: cd apps/fluentd && docker build --platform linux/amd64 --build-arg BUILD_DATE=$(date -u +%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ) -t emprops/fluentd:latest .
scripts.d:fluentd:build:nocache: cd apps/fluentd && docker build --no-cache --platform linux/amd64 --build-arg BUILD_DATE=$(date -u +%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ) -t emprops/fluentd:latest .
scripts.d:fluentd:status: curl -s http://localhost:24220/api/plugins | jq || echo '❌ Fluentd health check failed'
scripts.d:machine:status: curl -s http://localhost:9092/health | jq || echo '❌ Health check failed'
scripts.dev:machine: cd apps/machine && DEV_ENV=local-dev docker-compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml up comfyui-dev
scripts.dev:machine:prod: cd apps/machine && DEV_ENV=local-prod docker-compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml up comfyui-dev
scripts.dev:machine:sim: cd apps/machine && DEV_ENV=local-dev docker-compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml up simulation-dev
scripts.dev:machine:sim:prod: cd apps/machine && DEV_ENV=local-prod docker-compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml up simulation-dev
scripts.dev:machine:exec: cd apps/machine && docker exec -it comfyui-dev bash
scripts.dev:machine:debug: cd apps/machine && DEV_ENV=local-dev WORKERS=comfyui:2 docker-compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml up comfyui-dev
scripts.dev:machine:debug:prod: cd apps/machine && DEV_ENV=local-prod WORKERS=comfyui:2 docker-compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml up comfyui-dev
scripts.d:all:build: pnpm d:fluentd:build && pnpm d:api:build && pnpm d:webhook:build
scripts.d:all:build:nocache: pnpm d:fluentd:build:nocache && pnpm d:api:build:nocache && pnpm d:webhook:build:nocache
scripts.d:all:build:push: pnpm d:fluentd:build:push && pnpm d:api:build:push && pnpm d:webhook:build:push
scripts.d:all:build:push:nocache: pnpm d:fluentd:build:push:nocache && pnpm d:api:build:push:nocache && pnpm d:webhook:build:push:nocache
